name: Blast Plan
description:
Blast Plan

Blast Plan is a game where you control an powerful robot who's wrecking his way through all machines and computer stations inside an spaceship crossing its way through the galaxy.

The point is to get as far as possible without lousing all of your own power and collect as much coins as you can on your way!

This game was submitted and made for the Low Rez Game Jam 2017

Quotes from players

"I like the look of our little robot guy, and also the laser" -Jupiter Hadley
